org.gbif.portal.action

Class BaseAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.opensymphony.xwork2.ActionSupport
      • org.gbif.portal.action.BaseAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.opensymphony.xwork2.Action, com.opensymphony.xwork2.LocaleProvider, com.opensymphony.xwork2.TextProvider, com.opensymphony.xwork2.Validateable, com.opensymphony.xwork2.ValidationAware, Serializable, org.apache.struts2.interceptor.ServletRequestAware, org.apache.struts2.interceptor.SessionAware, org.apache.struts2.util.ServletContextAware
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseSearchAction, DefaultHomeAction, DownloadCancelAction, DownloadResultAction, DownloadsAction, ExecuteDownloadAction, FragmentAction, HomeAction, HomeAction, HomeAction, HomeAction, IptAction, ListAction, MemberBaseAction, NameListsAction, OccurrenceBaseAction, RedirectAction, RegisterAction, SearchAction, UsageBaseAction

    public abstract class BaseAction
extends com.opensymphony.xwork2.ActionSupport
implements org.apache.struts2.interceptor.SessionAware, org.apache.struts2.interceptor.ServletRequestAware, org.apache.struts2.util.ServletContextAware
    A base class that provides accession to utilities for freemarker.
    See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • getCfg

        public Config getCfg()
        Exposed to make configurations available to javascript.

      • getBaseUrl

        public String getBaseUrl()
        Returns the application's base url. Exposed to simplify javascript. It takes into account the includeContext struts settings to strip of the context if not used.
        Returns:
        the base url of the application

      • getCurrentUrl

        public String getCurrentUrl()
        Returns the absolute url to the current page including the query string. Exposed to simplify freemarker and javascript. It takes into account the includeContext struts settings to strip of the context if not used.
        Returns:
        the absolute, current url

      • getCurrentUrlWithoutPage

        public String getCurrentUrlWithoutPage()
        Returns the absolute url to the current page including the query string, but having the paging parameters offset and limit removed. Exposed for the paging macros to not have to deal with this complexity in freemarker.

      • getCurrentDestinationParam

        public String getCurrentDestinationParam()
        Used by the drupal login destination parameter which expects a relative URL of the current page. We need to remove any scheme, host or port information and also the root slash.

      • getCurrentUser

        public org.gbif.api.model.common.User getCurrentUser()
        Returns:
        the currently logged in user.

      • getResourceBundleProperties

        public Map<String,String> getResourceBundleProperties(String... prefix)
        Returns a map representing properties from the resource bundle but just those properties whose keys match one or more of the given prefixes.
        Returns:
        a map which the matched properties
